import React from 'react' import '../App.css' import DataContext from '../Contexts/dataContext' import DataProvider from '../Providers/dataProvider' export default function () { return ( <> {({ isWeightHeight, handleClicked, handleHeight, handleWeight }) =>
handleHeight(e)} id="height" type="number" placeholder="50" />
handleWeight(e)} type="number" placeholder="160" />
{isWeightHeight.map((value) => { value.height != null && value.weight != null ? < table > {console.log(va)} {value.height} {value.weight} : <> // console.log(value) } ) }
} ); }
